title: attAkSi yAn
sahitya:
attAkSi yn manamE nArAyaNan anbaraik-kAppAn dinamE


anupallavi

  pittanEnaiyum oru piLLaiyenap-pENi buddhi pughaTTi nalla pughal aLittAn emmAn


caraNam    rAmadAs tuLasidAs nAma jnAnadEvar ravi haridAsar mIrA purandararum
mAma rasam arundik-kAmajayam porundi nambik-kaDaittEriya emperumAn kAppAn
